text: (apanee) aayaten taphaseeladaar bayaan karata hai aur vah vahee hai jisane zameen ko bichhaaya aur usamen (bade bade) atal pahaad aur dariya banae aur usane har tarah ke mevon kee do do kismen paida kee (jaise khatte meethe) vahee raat (ke parade) se din ko dhaak deta hai isamen shaq nahin ki jo log aur gaur va phikr karate hain unake lie isamen (kudarat khuda kee) bahuteree nishaaniyaan hain
